job_description:
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet software engineering requirements.
• The ideal candidate will have experience in Microchip firmware (MPLAB, Harmony), embedded Linux (ARM SoCs, Quartus), C++ GUI development with Qt, and networking (TCP/UDP).
• You'll translate customer needs into technical solutions and support project development end-to-end.
• Security clearance eligibility required (DoD preferred).
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet software engineering requirements.
• Advanced Software Engr Locations Atlanta, GA, United States (Hybrid) Posting Date09/22/2025 Trending Software Engineer & Computer Science - Recent Grad/Full Time Locations United States Posting Date08/29/2025 Trending As a Recent Graduate here at Honeywell, you will have the opportunity to kickstart your career by working alongside experienced professionals in a dynamic and innovative environment.
• Advanced Software Engr Locations Atlanta, GA, United States (Hybrid) Posting Date09/22/2025 Trending Software Engineer & Computer Science - Summer 2026 Intern (US Person Required) Locations United States Posting Date08/29/2025 Trending Through hands-on learning experiences, global exposure, networking, and professional development opportunities, Honeywell interns will shape the future.
• You’ll have the opportunity to work alongside industry experts, lead initiatives that refine technical skills, and have unparalleled mentorship and growth opportunities that will elevate your career.
